content.en: Wavelet-based PDE solvers: Researchers have developed various algorithms based on Haar and Legendre wavelets to solve different types of partial differential equations. These algorithms provide efficient and reliable numerical solutions for problems such as parabolic, elliptic, and integro-differential equations. The Haar wavelet method, in particular, has been used to solve a wide range of equations, including distributed order time-fractional differential equations and variable order linear fractional integro-differential equations. These algorithms offer promising approaches for tackling complex mathematical problems in a more efficient and accurate manner.
content.da: Wavelet-baserede PDE-løsere: Forskere har udviklet forskellige algoritmer baseret på Haar- og Legendre-wavelets til at løse forskellige typer partielle differentialligninger. Disse algoritmer leverer effektive og pålidelige numeriske løsninger til problemer såsom paraboliske, elliptiske og integro-differentialligninger. Haar-wavelet-metoden er især blevet brugt til at løse en bred vifte af ligninger, herunder tids-fraktionelle differentialligninger med distribueret orden og variable ordens lineære fraktionelle integro-differentialligninger. Disse algoritmer tilbyder lovende tilgange til at håndtere komplekse matematiske problemer på en mere effektiv og præcis måde.
